core.name: Make Your Getaway Red Floral Print Maxi Dress

description: Oh, there are so many incredible movie-esque scenarios that I contemplated setting this scene with. Great moments of tension and excitement, bravery and a dash of careless passion! But in the end, I trusted my gut and decided that ultimately, it's going to be better if you imagine it yourself--created from scratch. Your mind is going to come up with the absolute best situation possible, the perfect scene. So what's it going to be? What would it be like to Make Your Getaway? And what are you getting away from? The corporate world? The daily routine of seeing the same four walls of your house? Maybe seeing the same town you've seen for way too many years? It's all up to you ... and this darling maxi dress, of course. Maxi dress features a v-neckline with adjustable ruffle straps (up to 2.5\"). Skirt has an invisible back zipper and two slits. Model is wearing a small. • 100% Polyester • Hand Wash Cold • Lined • Imported
title: Make Your Getaway Red Floral Print Maxi Dress

core.name: Whisper Of The Heart Burgundy Lace Dress

description: The heart knows what it wants, and, if you listen, you can hear its fluttering voice whispering guidance when you need it most. And when would a girl need a whisper of the heart more than when shopping for the perfect gown? I know, I know, there are a million things more dire than dress-shopping, but you try telling that to a woman when she finds the right outfit, and hears that whisper. If you’ve never experienced it, for one, shining moment, nothing else in the world matters but the thought of how you’ll look in that dress. Dress features exposed gold zipper, full nude lining on bust and skirt-small open lace band at waist. Model is wearing a small. • Self: 100% Polyester, Lining: 100% Lining • Hand Wash Cold • Made in the USA • Imported
title: Whisper Of The Heart Burgundy Lace Dress

Snag yourself one of these fun and flirty rompers, carve out an afternoon, and put absolutely nothing down on your schedule. Yes, you read that right. Then, go out into the day with nothing planned. core.name: Relish The Moment Red Embroidered Dress

description: The thing about moments is that they're fleeting. They're there one moment, gone the next. Most of the time, you don't even realize you missed a moment until it's already over with. Our solution, Relish The Moment by celebrating it in this gorgeous Embroidered Dress. Why is clothing important? Because it's memorable. It adds to the moment and it helps you to slow down and realize how special the moment is before it passes you by. So if anything, we're doing you a huge favor by making you take stock of what really matters. Who knew fashion could do something so meaningful? We did. We totally did. Red sun dress features a flowy, drop waist silhouette with an asymmetrical hemline, keyhole opening in front, exposed zipped in back, and colorful flower embroidery throughout the front and back. Model is wearing a small. • 65% Cotton 35% Polyester • Hand Wash Cold • Unlined • Imported
title: Relish The Moment Red Embroidered Dress

description: You want him to remember the exact moment he Fell For You. You want him to recall the way the room was lit, the way the shadows played on your face, the look in your eyes, the scent of your perfume, and of course, what you were wearing when you met him. Now, he'll likely remember you no matter what you wear, be it a paper bag or a designer dress (though we don't recommend the paper bag). But, it sure does help when it's a gorgeous little number like this one. Imagine the story you could tell if this could be part of -your- night. Yup, this is the one. core.name: Quite Alright Marsala Red Cardigan

description: You know that moment when you’re sitting in a nice restaurant, enjoying an intimate meal with your beau, when suddenly the server—who's been falling all over himself around you all evening—accidently spills the glass of red wine you’ve been savoring, effectively ruining your outfit? And rather than throttle him, you just smile gracefully and tell him it’s quite alright. “But wait,” you ask, “how do you expect me to miraculously attain such saintly graciousness as to dismiss the ruination of such beloved attire?” The answer is simple; you’ll be thinking that the loss of one outfit gives you the perfect excuse to seek its replacement. A cozy new cardigan for instance (hint; like this one). So, as the wine stain becomes permanent, this one happy thought will no doubt make you feel so indebted to the server that you’ll be hard-pressed not to leave a good tip despite. Model is wearing a small. • 55% Cotton 30% Acrylic 15% Nylon • Hand Wash Cold • Unlined • Imported

description: As wondrous as life can be at its best, there are an equal number of times when it can be dull as dirt. Thank goodness for your active imagination, because you can while away the hours with the most rewarding of daydreams. A bit of advice though, if we may: dress as though you expect something exciting to happen at any moment, even at the height of your boredom. You don’t want to be caught in a reverie, unprepared to make your daydreams a reality when opportunity strikes. This lace dress is versatile in that way, and stunning to boot. core.name: Total Mockout Dusty Plum Purple Dress

description: You look sexy in your jeans and a simple tee (mostly because you buy your jeans and tees from us, but that's beside the point), but you could be a Total Mockout in this Dusty Plum Purple Dress. Close your eyes and picture it, you're at a nice dinner, a glass of your favorite wine in hand, a freshly prepared dinner of your choice on its way, and a super hot guy making great conversation with you and playing footsie with you under the table, and you're wearing this slimming little number that's positively irresistible. And, since it's so affordable, you've saved enough cash that you can still do the check dance at the end of the date and actually pay for the dinner if he gives in and lets you pay.
